Contact

The Accident Guides is an educational publishing platform designed to help people find clear, practical information after accidents and injuries.

This page is for general questions about the site, its content, or its advertising and sponsorship policies.

About the Team Behind This Site

The Accident Guides is built and operated by Spry Labs, a division of Spry VSL, LLC. Since 2013, our team has worked across digital products, online platforms, and data-driven publishing initiatives.

Our experience spans multiple sectors, including advertising technology, B2B software, early-stage technology companies, and capital markets–adjacent environments. Much of our work has focused on building systems that operate at scale, meet regulatory and compliance standards, and serve users during high-stress decision-making moments.

This background informs how we approach clarity, structure, and trust in every educational property we operate.

How to Contact Us

For general inquiries, please reach us at:

Email: info@spryvc.com

Important Limitations

We do not provide legal advice, medical advice, or case-specific guidance. We cannot recommend, rank, or endorse individual professionals or firms.

Contacting us does not create an attorney-client relationship or any other professional relationship. For advice about your specific situation, consult a qualified, licensed professional directly.

Advertising & Professional Inquiries

Professional service providers interested in advertising or sponsorship opportunities should review the For Firms page for details on available placements and policies.

All advertising is clearly labeled and does not influence educational content.

Educational purpose only. This site is an educational publisher. It is not a law firm, not a medical provider, and not a referral service.

No legal advice. Nothing on this page is legal advice and you should not rely on it as a substitute for consulting a qualified attorney for advice about your situation.

No medical advice. Nothing on this page is medical advice. Seek care from a licensed clinician for medical concerns.

No guarantees or endorsements. We do not guarantee outcomes. Directory listings and advertising do not constitute endorsements. Inclusion is informational and based on publicly available information.

Advertising disclosure. Any advertising placements are labeled “Advertising.” Sponsored placements are intended to be visually separate from editorial content.
